Summary: Me, my sister and my dad saw a red flying saucer.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around July 31st 2002
divs: Sighting Details1.Me, my sister and my dad had been swimming.2.I just looked at the direction ofthe object.3.I first thought it was a helicopter but after some seconds irealised it could only be a flying saucer.4.It was shaped like a saucer and wasred, it had yellow lights and was flying in different directions totallysilently.5.it flyed away.
